name: places/ChIJJen10xz0wokRUTl26uwk61c
adrFormatAddress: 4446 Broadway, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: Its the closest clinic to me and their equipment is good but I have some complaints and hope they change. The waiting is ridiculous and long. The waiting room crowds up to the door in the morning so come in afternoon. The dentist uses cheap methods to clean teeth and its getting on my nerves that they still use cheap paste. Also they would change your appointments without caring that you're having an emergency.

originalText.text:
Dont expect personal comfortable care here just do what is needed for health because theyre just nosey narcissist and everytime i come here they blow my mind but i have to get what i need done
Someday I will find my real personal care
Update
They did this again. They tell me come in at a certain time and then I'm waiting for hours and their  equipment wasnt in good condition.

originalText.text: If I could give this place 0 star I would. This is the worst clinic ever. The medical assistance that work here are very unprofessional and rude in person and on the phone. If you go to this place, make sure you bring your couch, blanket because you will sleep here. The waiting here is terrible, you will expect to be here for 5-10 hours. If you don't want to wait so long here, you might want to keep reminding them your name and the time that you got there because otherwise they will forget that you exist. How easy is their job? Not only that but they call you a day before to schedule the time but you will leave with the doctor basically because the appointment time is not guaranteed, trust me! Worse place ever I can keep on going talking about this place but the best I can do is to stop going there and advice you guys. It's crazy how you set up an appointment at 10am because according to them the doctors are there from 10am-4pm but you set your appointment at 10am to be the first one but they ended up calling you at 4:30pm...... how is that?  But if one day you can't make at 4:00pm and be there at 4:10pm the doctor can't see you. But if one day you make your appointment at 4pm and unfortunately things happen, you get to be there at 4:10pm, they won't see you, you will have to reschedule. I stop going hers and I regret going here. I come all the way from Brooklyn and is not worth it. I regret it

originalText.text:
This is the worst place on earth !!!
Please don't go there at all!
The staffs are very rude, unprofessional, careless...and I can go on and on...
The waiting time is very very long...and when ever they call you they'll call you by other name...
The staffs do not know what they are doing...
They give me a referral to get an MRI with  the rong name on it...so I call to have them fax it over to the lab....after they had me waiting on the phone for over 20min. They ask me to call back, so I did, just to so they could tell me to come in person!!
I explained that i lived in Brooklyn and that I was already at the lab and missed work  ..so the Dr's assistant  said that she didnt care and that i could do what ever I wanted..that i had to be there in person for them to fix they mistake.
Please please DO NOT GO THERE!

originalText.text: Worst staff ever!!! Lazy inefficient secretaries making everybody lose their time! The waiting time it’s ridiculous! In average you have to wait 3-4 hours to see a Doctor, this is PASSED you appointment time.
